# News

- As I'm approaching the finish line of PhD, in May 2025 I had the chance to present the whole project at the [DSCNext Conference Europe 2025](https://dscnextcon.com/speaker/patrick/).
- Taija, the organization that hosts software geared towards Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence in Julia, has its own website now: [www.taija.org](https://www.taija.org/).
- In July 2024, I presented our position paper "Stop Making Unscientific AGI Performance Claims" at ICML 2024. [[preprint](https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.03962)], [[blog post](/blog/posts/spurious-sparks/index.qmd)], [[slides/poster](/content/talks/posts/2024-icml/index.qmd)]
